mapper.select: SELECT SUM(AMT) AS TITLE, TO_CHAR(TDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "start", USER_ID, CASE WHEN IO_CODE='I1' THEN 'out' ELSE 'in' END AS "className" FROM TOTAL_TRANS WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} GROUP BY TDATE, IO_CODE, USER_ID ORDER BY TDATE

SELECT T.TDATE, T.NUM, T.USER_ID, T.CONTENT, T.AMT, T.IO_CODE, T.CAT_CODE, C.VAL, #{keyword} AS KEYWORD FROM TOTAL_TRANS T JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON T.CAT_CODE = C.CODE WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND UPPER(CONTENT) LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND TDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)) AND SYSDATE ORDER BY TDATE DESC
